Title: Imperium Home Automation Libraries
Description: A set of home automation libraries written in .NET. Currently supports two X10 controllers.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A set of home automation libraries written in .NET. Currently supports two X10 controllers.

Several years ago I released an X10 library at http://brian.vallelunga.com/code/x10/. Due to heavy demand, I have opened the project and source to the community under the new name, Imperium.
